General.Name: Asia Sejahtera Mina Tbk
General.Description: PT Asia Sejahtera Mina Tbk processes and sells seaweeds in Indonesia. The company offers dried Eucheuma cottoni, Eucheuma spinosum, and Gracilaria seaweeds. It also operates in agriculture, fisheries, and processing industries. PT Asia Sejahtera Mina Tbk was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan DR. Makaliwe Raya No. 16 B, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia

AddressData.Street: Jalan DR. Makaliwe Raya No. 16 B
